values:
i am in such a good mood!  i passed my gov/econ exam.  *yay*!  i just got through taking my first block exam.  it was super easy.  the craziest thing happened this morning.  shana accidently stabbed her flag pole through rosalyn's back windshield.  they are both still in shock.  things will work out.  
shana baby, i know you're having a rough time right now and i just want to let you know that i am here for you.  things will be ok.  if ever you need a break from your house, you know where i live.  holla at your girl, bitch.  i'll give you love.  
i miss my husband.  i will see him around seven though, so i guess i can make it.  i loves him so much!
chris, don't think that i have forgoten about you making my sub.  you will do it. 
i love you
-a the wife
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/13207.html

My sexy husband and i watched dodge ball last night.  that movie is fucking great.  the guy was all feeling on his big boobs singing my milkshake brings all the boys to the yard.  well enough about that.  we are only a few more hundred dollars away from getting our apartment.  *so happy*  brandon gets his study and i get the closet under the stairs.  i swear i feel like harry potter or something.  chris, i will buy some more bon bons.  much love. 
-a the wife
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/12890.html

i am in a really good mood!  Brandon is getting off early today because he has to go to the dentist.  so... he is going to help me study for my gov/econ exam.  that is going to suck because i freaking hate that class.  but it's all good. i get to spend lots of time with my very sexy fiance.  love to those who deserve it.  i love you brandon
-a the wife
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/12729.html

hi guys.  life is great.  Brandon and i are happier than we ever have been.  he's making that money for me.  hell yeah.  back to class.  i love you
-a the wife
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/12330.html

*update*
my mother knows that Brandon and I are together.  the creepy thing about it is she approves.  wtf?!  that's some crazy shit!  i am happy.  

i am secretary of DECA.  i also work in the canteen at trade school.  *extra credit*

life is good

i love you
- a the wife
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/12087.html

i am freaking sleepy.  today was good.  i really enjoy not doing anyhing in first and second block.  it was very nice.  i am over at my sweethearts house right now.  i misseded him.  he has to go to the dentist tomorrow.  he's not too happy about that.  i had sex with chris's foot today.  *nice* off to sleep

i love you doll

-a the wife
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/11970.html

brandon had to work for 17 hours yesterday.  he's really tired.  i'd be tired too if i had to do all of that shit.  eric and i are in the computer lab.  we are suppose to be working on a project but... i finished mine last night.  back to searching the internet.  
i love you

-a the wife
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/11560.html

the husband is in mobile.  he won't be back in town until around midnight.  i am sad.  we had a lot of fun yesterday.  i took him to his dad's house.  we stayed there for about an hour.  my car almost died.  it was sad.  i have to write a report
i love you

- a the wife
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/11338.html

brandon and i have been together for 8 months and five days.  it's great.  i had to go to the doctor.  brandon called into work and went with me.  we ate hardees.  *biscuit n gravy* very nice. i went home and passed the fuck out afterwards.  school is great.  nine months and some change left until graduation.  

i love you

-a the wife
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/11077.html

diner turned 18!  happy birthday my diner!

that shit is great tristian.  thanks.

i love you doll.
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/11005.html

the hurricane is a commin'.  oh dear god.  yeah my ass is staying at home.  fuck the dumb shit.  my house is hard.

work is closed until thursday. *hell yeah*  i am happy.  i'm going to miss eating dinners though.  *tear*

oh yeah... rosalyn and i both made an 83 at summer school. *happy dance*  this is our final year and it feels so good.  go to school, graduate, wait a few weeks, marry the love of my life.  

i love you jack.  you are my pretty little princess.  

-a the wife
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/10738.html

today is princess brandina's birthday.  he is 19.  *yay*  he was very romantic last night but state of mind was too altered to remember it.  but it's all good.  i know he loves me. 

working eleven hours tomorrow. oh joy. fucking forth of july and shit.

i love you my pretty little princess!

got a new tongue ring. *HOT*
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/10476.html

had to go to court at three today. it sucked. they were all like "you're here for one of three reasons, you have too many tardies, too many absences, or you're in trouble. blah blah blah" i sat in that fucking room for an hour. no worries. i didn't have to go to work.

i love you my pretty little princess. even your purple make up and purple dress
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/10144.html

dude... that's a long fucking time... especially for me... *wo*... im happy... good mood...

jack... you are grounded... you are grounded for a very long time... what did i tell you last night?... don't leave the house... but no... you had to... FOUR DAYS... don't make it five... i love you...

i wanted to shoot myself in the fucking face last night... oh my fucking god... i was so bored... jesus christ... one more graduation i have to attend... my own... and kyla's and shana's but... that's different... they're my children... my babies are growing up... *NO*...!

much love to those i care about...
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/5309.html

dude... i feel like blah... i don't know why, it's just blah... it's not exactly a bad thing... but... 

jack you are in so much trouble... this will be the third day... i am not happy with you young man... you're grounded... oh wait... i'm grounded... never mind... you are still in trouble though... i'm gonna fuck you up... i will do it... you had better start looking for an apartment... i swear to god... i am fucking stressing over this shit... i have like a little over a year left and you still don't have a place to live... can you not see where i am coming from?... jesus... i'm fucking freaking out over this shit... goddamnit... we're gonna have like fifty million fucking bills and shit... god... i need to drop it before i have a fucking heart attack... *breathe*

not much has been going on... besides me freaking out on you just then... graduation is tonight... oh yay... note the sarcasm... there's like a 75% chance of showers tonight... you know if it rains tonight... then i will be really happy... because i don't want to play... unless it's in the snow... and there is no snow in little Bay Minette so... oh the well...

jme is sick... aw... poor jme... she's gonna die... yep... i claim the explorer when she dies... MINE... jk my sweet... or am i?... 

kyla... don't forget to buckle up... tehe... i loves you...

doll... i love you but STOP MAKING ME STRESSED!... don't bitch about graduation... i told you to go if you wanted to... but you're not so don't blame it on me... i love you
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/5108.html

omg... i'm fucking grounded... great fucking job... my fucking mother is retarted... oh the well...

friday was good... i liked it... one word to describe friday for those who don't know... OUCH... enough said...

my jack and i aren't fighting... but he is in a lot of fucking trouble... oh yes... stupid fucker... but i love him so...

why am i gonna be even more pissed off at you my jack?... i swear to fucking god... you had better tell me or i'll do something stupid... don't put it past me... you know i will... i love you...

kyla and shana... you have my love...
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/4722.html

*YAY*!!!! today is one of the best days ever!!!...  oh my god!!... i'm gonna die... *wo* buddy!... 

i can't wait until i get back in town so i can go to the *graveyard*... i haven't been there since the last friday the 13th... and we all know what happen last friday the 13th, don't we?... *evil laughs*... hopefully there will be another empty grave... i hope so... because that shit was so much fun...

i wish bad luck upon all of you...

i love jack... and my kyla of course... 

baby i came by this morning but i guess you were asleep... i tried... love you
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/4451.html

good fucking mood... really fucking good... happy dance...


WANT SOME SEX?........
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/4158.html
baby look what jme found!... i so happyyyy!... it's perdy... if you don't know why it's perdy i will leave you right now...
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/3923.html

today... today is one of those days... i don't know... can't really describe it... but who cares?...

goddamnit!... mother fucker!... why are you two fucking fighting over me?!... i'm not that great... honestly... you two make me sick... jesus christ... ok... not really... I'M SPECIAL... i gots two people fighting for me... *YAY*... 

love you jack... 

love you kyla...

now PLAY NICE...
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/3731.html
i love you diner... i'm miss you already and you're sitting next to me... *tears*... love you
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/3211.html

god... last night sucked so fucking bad... i was SO fucking pissed... but maybe i shouldn't have be pissed... i don't know... driving around and calling the one that i love for nearly a fucking hour and failing miserabley kinda fucking sucks... fuck the dumb shit... i'm over it... he was talking to david... no big deal...
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/1169.html

oh my god! the guy that lives next to me saw jack and i at faulkner! *heart attack*... i told him that jack was josh so maybe he won't go running his mouth... i seriously doubt it though... damn... that really fucking sucks... then uncle willie was teasing me about being all over my jack... it was really funny... but scary at the same time... oops... i didn't mean to... ok... so i did... i couldn't help it... i really missed my doll... *tear*... i have to go back up to faulkner at 11... oh joy... i get to be pissed off at stupid fucks for not knowing their lines... and that really fucking pisses me off... ok... i don't know all of my lines... but jesus fucking christ... i can improve... my part is not that major... goddamnit... i fucking hate stupid people...
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/1020.html

ok... theres a lot of fucking shit going on right now... for starters... DRAMA PLAY... TONIGHT... OH MY FUCKING GOD... we need some serious fucking help... yeah... i think we can make it through the night... i hope... someone pray to a god... PLEASE... but enough of me being nervous and shit...
  Chester is back with her Doll! YAY!!!... happy dance... i'm gonna have a fucking seizure or some shit... i so happy! EEEEE!... ok... so i'm a giddy little school girl... kiss my ass... i can't help it... HE'S MINE!!!!... EVIL LAUGHS...
  back to the play tonight... my outfit is bitchin'... very sexy... or atleast i think so... that's right... i'm a wench... a pirate wench to be exact... aaargh... god i hope we get the lines and everything down tonight... i think we will...
  ok... i don't have anything else to say because it's too fucking early in the morning... thanks Jack for making this for me... i love you
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/642.html
I just made this journal for Cherrish, so she doesn't have to comment as anonymous anymore. I hope you like it, baby. I love you.
http://ladyblackheart.livejournal.com/504.html
